overview: The Healing Church is a pro-Cannabis Catholic community based in Rhode Island. I made this video — twelve minutes of cops and Antifa, conservatives and conspiracy theorists — when they came to Pittsburgh to host something called the Make America Great Again march and rally. It was recorded on DVD and then captured again in 640x480 for a video art installation, and the video effects were created on an analog video synth emulator called Cathodemer.
title: The Healing Church
